p: Upon attaching of the virus to the cell surface via angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) and cleavage of the viral spike protein by proteases like transmembrane protease, serine 2 (TMPRSS2) that enables fusion of the virus with the cell membrane, SARS-CoV-2 enters cells by endocytosis ( Azkur et al., 2020). The resulting activation of different viral detection systems and innate immune responses of the host cells ( Azkur et al., 2020) and the immunopathology of SARS-CoV-2 infection ( Vabret et al., 2020) have recently been summarized.
